text: Robert Gene Moore (February 15, 1929 â€“ February 10, 2024) was an American food executive who founded Bob's Red Mill, a brand of wholegrain foods and baking products in 1978. He founded the business with his wife, Charlee. In 2010, the company had reached revenues of $100 million. In 2018, he retired as chief executive officer of the business, but served on the board until his death. An illustration of Moore's face is found on all of the company's products. He died at his home in Milwaukie, Oregon on February 10, 2024, five days before his 95th birthday. == References == Category:1929 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American company founders
title: Bob Moore (American food executive)
